original_title: Michael Bull Roberts: The Tender Heart of a Beast
overview: The violence of childhood formed the man who became, Michael Bull Roberts: Gang Leader, Drug Dealer, Enforcer, Man of Violence. And then God met him on the floor of a hotel room, smashed knees, broken bones, crushed spirit. Michael called out to God with all of his heart, and found Him.
tagline: The riveting account of a gangster transformed by Christ
title: Michael Bull Roberts: The Tender Heart of a Beast
